Funny enough, there’s more people with a good taste in dinosuar illustrations and strange music in town—and they put on this very fine show on Monday, May 28th:


Income tax refund
presents


DOLPHINS [slacko pop | Leipzig]

No-pudency chill pop from Leipzig. You know'em by now, don’t you?

https://www.facebook.com/Underwaterwaterwater
https://dolphinsunderwater.bandcamp.com
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jpWMcesy6Gc
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCohxGaTnM6hWyP3ahF-mvVg


FREAK HEAT WAVES [art punk | Toronto] Telephone Explosion/Hockey Dad Records

From the orbit of bands like Preoccupations (ex-Viet Cong/Women) or Cindy Lee this duo brings to stage a most strange version of post-punk-influenced pop. Hear for yourselves…

https://freakheatwaves.bandcamp.com
https://soundcloud.com/telephoneexplosion


NEW FRIES [no wave punk | Toronto] Telephone Explosion/Pleasence Records

This band has it all: exigent ESG-style basslines, stoic rumblings and ramblings as heard in bands like Spray Paint, trippling and pressing vocals as Priests—a bludgeoning mixxx…

https://newfries.bandcamp.com


LOCATION KxHx
DOORS/TÜR/PORTES 8pm

Poster by Malwine
ᑕू∙ો ੍ http://malwines.tumblr.com

don’t forget your earplugs!

May 27th, 2018 1:00pm
